pageTitle: Smithsonian Recalls First Live Global TV Broadcast « CBS Baltimore
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {7626=In July 1962, the Telstar satellite carried live pictures to audiences in the U.S., Canada and Europe for the first time. The broadcast began with pictures of the Statue of Liberty and the Eiffel Tower., 6871=(Copyright 2012 by The Associated Press.  All Rights Reserved.)}
